name: /Collection2 (soundscapes of Lisbon) - #2 Caís do Sodré
description:
I was in Lisbon between 19/10 and 20/03 when I made many soundscape recordings during my audio classes at the University of Lusofona. Bringing Murray Schaffer's concept with me, I studied the city's sound at various points, allowing a total immersion in the various areas of the city as well as creating a historical record with a scientific method of these environments.
/Equipment Zoom H5 PRO
/Location Cais do Sodré - Lisbon - Portugal
/Date 2019-10-11
/Time 15:20:00
/Static No
/Creative Commons No
//Binaural Yes
